name: Category
description: The Category class represents a category in Revit, which is a group of similar elements.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Gets the ElementId of the category.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Gets the name of the category.

properties.name: AllowsBoundParameters
properties.description: Indicates whether the category allows bound parameters.

properties.name: CategoryType
properties.description: Gets the type of the category.

properties.name: Material
properties.description: Gets or sets the default material for the category.

methods.name: GetBuiltInCategory()
methods.description: Gets the built-in category corresponding to this category.

methods.name: IsTagCategory()
methods.description: Determines whether this is a tag category.

methods.name: IsSubcategory()
methods.description: Determines whether this is a subcategory.

methods.name: GetBuiltInParameter(BuiltInParameter)
methods.description: Gets a built-in parameter for the category.
